reviewText: It`s incredible the strength of mind and voice that this guy keeps at an age when many of our friends are retired. I`m only 39 but since I knew Tom Jones style and voice, I was captured by his unique presence. I watched this video on TV and man, let me tell you that this tape will show you the best of Tom Jones.
Title: N/A

reviewText: If you are a Jones fan, then this DVD is a must purchase.  If you are not sure if you like Tom Jones that much, or not, then its still a must purchase because by the time you've watched this incredible show, you will know he is THE BEST male vocalist in the world!  His true abilities were evident way back in the 1960's, however, it has taken years for him to gain the respect of music critics and others I suspect because of his sexy dancing and grinding, that make the ladies go wild.  His voice is the true show however....Check out "Without Love", "A Boy From Nowhere" or "I'll Never Fall in Love Again" if you want a display of power and ability that no one else can touch.

reviewText: I was more than pleasantly surprised with this DVD. Tom Jonesstill has it! His voice is powerful, and he is accompanied by his terrific band of super-talented musicians. He's a perfectionist and this proves it.  I can only say if you area Tom Jones fan, you will absolutely not be disappointed withthis DVD. I am overwhelmed by it.  Wow!
summary: Tom Jones - Live at Cardiff Castle

reviewText: Just be careful when purchasing this DVD.  It is region 1 (not region 2 as described by Amazon).  In addition, it only has pcm stereo audio (not dts or digital 5.1 as described by Amazon).  The audio menu does have dts and 5.1 output options but they do not work.
Title: N/A

reviewText: We have always liked Tom Jones voice and have seem him in concert several times.  I'm sure that this was a great live show and we would have loved to be there.  He can still sing great and put on a good show but the way they film so many of these events leave a lot to be desired.  I wonder what is wrong with just filming the show and letting people watch it without all of the quick cuts and weird angles.  I don't want to watch the crowd.  All in all still pretty good DVD.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is one of those concerts which is often better to see on DVD than actually being there because I'm sure half the crowd that were there couldn't see a damn thing.Lucky us because this is a fantastic concert.Along with Bill Champlin of the band 'Chicago' Tom Jones is one of the finest voices in rock n roll.All the hits are here great band,gorgeous back up singers (poster girls for leather pants)and an all dancin all singin Tom Jones. He is the great Welsh legend this DVD is highly recommended
Title: N/A

reviewText: Do you like camera changes at every 3 seconds? That is what you are going to have with this DVD. Great performances, many hits, excellent musicians and Tom in top form. But these endless camera moves are pointless and make me feel dizzy, especially with a large screen. Impossible to follow a musician or Tom himself because the point of view is always changing. It must be fun for the editor to change angles at all the times, but that person must be the only one to enjoy it ! Too bad this editing style has now become fashionable. I cannot stand it more than 3 minutes, and here you get it for two hours.
summary: Do you like camera changes at every 3 seconds?
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is for sure a Tom Jones classic with him singing great along with a well selection of songs.  I am not sure what following he has, maybe more in England and Europe than the united states but he can for sure sing.  Really enjoyed his take on some newer songs and really gave new life to them.  Not sure how you would qualify his category, vocal, pop, light rock, could be some of each.  Nonetheless, if you are a fan be sure to see it or for that matter anyone who enjoys a good clean singing performance.Peter Miller
